QuestData.Title: A Ghost in the Machine
QuestData.Description: I fear that these dwarves do not understand what they have built upon. This area was once the ancestral grounds for the Shadowmoon orcs. I speak of spirits, $r.$B$BFor nearly twenty years they have laid dormant beneath the Wildhammer Stronghold, but recently, something has riled them up.$B$BVenture beyond the gates of Wildhammer and seek out the pools and rivers of fel lava found across this land. Near the lava will be ever-burning ash. Bring me this ash so that I may craft something that will help us.
QuestData.LogDescription: Zorus the Judicator at Wildhammer Stronghold in Shadowmoon Valley wants you to bring him 15 Ever-burning Ash samples.
QuestData.CompletionText: Aye, a duality exists... I can feel it.
QuestData.RewardText: <Zorus begins to craft something out of the ash samples.>$B$BIt is done. Behold, Spectrecles!
